EmailTemplate.name: Registration FLC Approval Email
EmailTemplate.subject: FLC License Approved
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
For: {!License_Registration__c.Legal_Entity_Name__c} Application ID: {!License_Registration__c.License_Registration_Number__c} We have approved your Farm Labor Contractor License. Your picture license will be issued and mailed to you as soon as possible.
To print a verification of your license please go the the State's website to print a verification. https://cadir.my.salesforce-sites.com/RegistrationSearch
Thank you, Licensing & Registration Unit
